column2: an A.M. Eatery////After waiting for so long I hoped my food would be at least warm and fresh
column3: but instead my omelette was cold
column4: my partner's eggs were as well
column5: and they gave her the completely wrong sides. The only redeeming quality was the pancake i got on the side was pretty decent
column6: but also not very warm. I've heard great things about this place in the past so not sure what happened
column7: but not sure I'll be rushing back anytime soon.
